TALENT_ACADEMY.DESCRIPTION: I significantly contributed to the development, maintenance, and testing of features used by thousands of users, with a special emphasis on front-end development. While my primary role was focused on user interface and experience, I also engaged in database modeling, API creation and maintenance, and other backend-related tasks, ensuring a comprehensive understanding of the entire project development cycle

SECONCISP_1.DESCRIPTION: In this position, my primary focus was on the implementation and advanced utilization of Zabbix for network monitoring, playing a crucial role in enhancing system reliability and reducing network downtime. This implementation involved customizing Zabbix templates and creating complex monitoring scenarios. Additionally, I managed server environments, implemented security solutions, and handled the maintenance of virtualization infrastructure. I was also responsible for administering directory services and file systems, significantly contributing to the optimization of network operations and the security of the IT infrastructure.

SECONCISP_2.DESCRIPTION: As a  Full Stack Developer at Seconci-SP, I played a pivotal role in developing, maintaining, and enhancing an in-house tool for managing contracts. My responsibilities involved crafting intuitive and responsive user interfaces on the front-end, significantly improving user interaction and experience. In parallel, my back-end efforts were focused on robust API development and efficient database management, ensuring the tool's overall functionality and reliability. This role provided a comprehensive experience in both front-end and back-end development, honing my skills in creating and optimizing web applications for complex business processes.

AGILE_THOUGHT.DESCRIPTION: I work as an Angular Front-End Consultant at Santander, contributing to a key project focused on schedule management for bank managers. I develop the user interface using Angular and a microfrontend architecture, ensuring a seamless and efficient user experience.
